title: MOBILE TO YOUR DOOR TIG WELDING AND FABRICATION

posts.content:
RIGHT EXPANDING MY SKILLS AND SERVICES, SOME OF YOU GUYS HAVE NOW SEEN THE QUALITY OF MY WORK AND I TELL YOU NOW THERE ARE NEVER ANY COMPROMISES.
I AM OFFERING MY SERVICES AS A BESPOKE FABRICATOR/WELDER.

MY TIG WELDER AND MOST OF MY TOOLS ARE FULLY PORTABLE SO IF THERE IS SOMETHING THAT NEEDS TO BE WELDED AND YOU WANT IT TO LOOK PRETTY I'M YOUR MAN.

MOST METALS CAN BE CATERED FOR EXCEPT ALUMINIUM. I CAN WELD STAINLESS STEEL, MILD STEEL AND TITANIUM TO MENTION A FEW.

I WOULD JUST NEED YOU TO PROVIDE THE POWER, GARAGE AND VEHICLE AND MAYBE THE LUNCH.

I WILL BE CHARGING A MINIMUM CALL OUT FEE OF £45 FOR WITHIN A 50 MILE RADIUS OF ME(SILVERSTONE, NORTHANTS), WITH A FURTHER £10 PER EXTRA 25 MILES RADIUS.

IF YOU WANT A CONSULTANCY THEN THIS WOULD BE AN EXTRA £30. THIS SERVICE WILL INCLUDE A DISCUSSION OF YOUR NEEDS AND IDEAS TO SOLVE PROBLEMS AND DRAWINGS TO SUIT YOUR APPLICATION BEFORE BRINGING ALL THE TOOLS TO COMPLETE THE JOB ON THE NEXT VISIT.

I WILL BE CHARGING £45 PER HOUR FOR THIS; YOU ARE GETTING A SUPERIOR WELDING SERVICE OF WHICH I LET MY WORK DO THE TALKING. JUST REMEMBER A CAR GARAGE CAN WELD, BUT CAN THEY TIG WELD?.. I SAY NO, CAN THEY MIG WELD? YES, SOME CAN THROW A BIT DOWN. WILL IT LOOK PRETTY? NO.

SO IF YOUR ROLL HOOPS NEED MODIFYING, OR YOU WANT A BRACKET TO BE BUILT THEN GIVE ME A SHOUT.
THIS ALSO APPLYS FOR YOUR EXHAUST NEEDS I CAN COME TO YOU AND THROW TOGETHER A MOCK UP. FOR ME TO TAKE AWAY AND BUILD ALL PRETTY.

THIS SERVICE WILL BE OFFERED AS WEEKENDS ONLY TO START WITH.

MIKE.
i can recommend mikes welding skills
Can you weld in a new floorpan and sill on Emily's mini??
Hi Mike, Post a Contact number or PM me it and I will keep it for future use.

simons121 wrote:Can you weld in a new floorpan and sill on Emily's mini??
i can do that , but it will take more than just 1 visit.
my contact number is 01280851261 i'm in from 5.30 most evenings but just leave a contact no. preferably a landline that i can call you back on.

mike has just finished welding the outer sills and rear corners on my wifes ghia..he made all the panels by hand...and here are some of mikes exhausts ..i have seen mikes work up close and it is awesome....
put some pics of your exhausts mike, as my photo bucket account won,t work...
It needs the passenger front floor pan and inner sill from what i can see. How much money do you think??
at a guess i would say £300-£400 as it has been nearly 20 yrs since i set foot in a mini.

some pics of restoration and fabrication work.

n/s rear sill area on a ghia

n/s rear corner on the same ghia no repair sections here just plain good old metal forming.

o/s rear bumper mount panel again hand formed.

a recent buggy exhaust i built.

a custom flame thrower exhaust built for a volksrod.

tubbing my ratty bay dc. no repair sections here either.

o/s front floor and lower step area. on seans splitty.

above flame throwers fitted to the car.


hope this helps.
Mike made this fake V8 in stainless , top quality work, wouldn't hesitate to recommend his skills.
just going to bump this up.
